title: Cannot redeem Dreadknight Garen Code
body:
Hello,

somehow I am unable to redeem my Deadknight Garen Code. It simply says "There was a problem fulfilling your store items, please try again. If this problem persits please contact us at support.riotgames.com." I noticed, via google, that Porocles adds the Skin manually when asked for here, so I'll give this a shot - thanks in advance!

Regards,

replies.body:
Can u help me too with this issue? 
EU1812BVEUABH68FK4H8JPRRQ
Looks like this account actually has it already!

The account alexbmb29 currently has the Dreadknight Garen skin unlocked as of checking right now. If you aren't able to select him there might be something going wrong with your client in which I'd try a quick repair.
